RelativeLayout: <#list fields as field> <#if !field.relation??> <TextView android:id="@+id/row_${name}_${field.name}" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" <#if (field_index==0)> android:layout_alignParentTop="true" /> <#else> android:layout_below="@+id/row_${name}_${fields[field_index-1].name}" /> </#if> </#if> </#list> <#list relations as relation> <#if (relation.relation.type=="OneToOne" | relation.relation.type=="ManyToOne")> <TextView android:id="@+id/row_${name}_${relation.name}" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" <#if (relation_index==0)> android:layout_below="@+id/row_${name}_${fields?last.name}" /> <#else> android:layout_below="@+id/row_${name}_${relations[relation_index-1].name}" /> </#if> </#if> </#list>
